attributes.action: Only use the Retail Price Index (RPI), in order to show the true rate of inflation, when deciding interest rates and pay increases.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government generally uses the Consunmer Price Index, rather than the RPI, in order to decide the current rate of inflation. This however does not show the true cost of living in todays society, as people need to pay for housing and council tax etc. This allows them to give derisory pay increases to the workforce, and allow the true cost of living to rise unchecked.
